content: love paperbacks protect your reads with this easy crochet book cover pattern perfect for yourself or as a thoughtful gift if you re a fan of paperback books this new crochet pattern is for you this simple book cover design not only protects your favorite reads but also adds a personal touch to your literary collection the pattern is easy to follow with plenty of photos and to guide you through the process whether you re trying out a yarn pooling technique videos are included or sticking with a classic solid color this project is both fun and functional make one for yourself or as a gift for the book lovers in your life > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
